summary: A new English school-teacher also teaches music but ends up leading both teachers and students to revolt against the school management.
cast: Adil Feroz Khan|Nana Patekar|Shahid Kapoor|Ayesha Takia|Sushant Singh|Saurabh Shukla|Anjan Srivastav|Kurush Deboo|Sanatan Mody|Shraddha Arya|Kainaz Motivala|Dwij Yadav|Swini Khara|Ali Haji|Salman Ahmed|Vicky Ahuja|Bikky Ahujaa|Apoorva|Rajesh Balwani|Manuj Bhaskar|Chandni|Sunil Chaurasia|Faraz|Avika Gor|Irene|Archana Jaani|Rishabh Jain|Saagar Kale|Radhika Kashyap|Priyesh Kaushik|Preeti Koppikar|Lubhan|Manas|Sushmita Mukherjee|Sanjay Nath|Nitin|Deepika Pant|Rahul|Richa|Kuldeep Sareen|Hanif Shaikh|Sunil Shetty|Arhan Singh|Sunny Singh|Tanish|Jehangir Vakil|Vibhuti
title: Get Educated: Paathshaala
